attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. If you're seeking a compact SUV with impressive versatility, know that the 2022 Honda CR-V does just about everything well, the CR-V has become the world’s best-selling SUV. 
The two-row Honda provides an attractive and spacious cabin bolstered by bountiful storage solutions that are perfect for road trips.
Good to look at, good to drive, and good on petrol: the CR-V is among the most fuel-efficient compact crossovers. This vehicle includes a 5 years/200000km warranty and a 5 years/90000km service plan. Make it yours and book your test drive today!

Finance Available to all Approved Buyers, Trade in's are Welcome and Delivery Nationwide.
